forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 12C. WSW winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 54F. WSW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing after midnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
